headline: Strength in Advanced Technology Unit Drives Nordson: Can the Momentum Sustain?
summary: NDSN's Advanced Technology sales rose 8% in the first nine months of 2025, driving margin gains and a bullish full-year outlook.

raw.headline: Strength in Advanced Technology Unit Drives Nordson: Can the Momentum Sustain?
raw.summary: NDSN's Advanced Technology sales rose 8% in the first nine months of 2025, driving margin gains and a bullish full-year outlook.

headline: How Is Nordson's Stock Performance Compared to Other Industrial Stocks?
summary: Nordson has notably underperformed other industrial stocks over the past year, yet analysts remain moderately bullish on the stock’s prospects.
